factual_disputes.description: Direct contradictions on verifiable facts (numbers, dates, quotes, events). Can be empty array if no disputes found. Maximum 3 most important disputes.

what.description: Brief label of what is disputed. Examples: 'Casualty count', 'Event timing', 'Quote attribution'. Maximum 8 words.

claim_a.description: First claim. Be specific with numbers/details. Maximum 25 words.

claim_b.description: Conflicting claim. Be specific with numbers/details. Maximum 25 words.
